name: Forever Lost
description:
Controls

You can move around with the WASD or Arrow keys.
Run with Shift.
And interact with E.

Description

This is a horror puzzle game with a story. You and your friends decide to enter a  "haunted" mansion. Little do you know, it actually is haunted. You have to go through the building, solving puzzles, just to get out of that place. Keep an eye out on your surroundings, they might help you solve some puzzles.

Disclaimer
Sound works better in the build (some don't work in WebGL). You also won't have the issue with exiting fullscreen when closing some UI screens with the Esc key.

But feel free to use the WebGL for a quicky :)
